articles.title: From juggling to cricket: How parents and teachers can help kids kick the pandemic slump | CBC News
articles.description: Daily physical activity levels for Canadian children and teens dropped significantly during the pandemic, as school itself has become more sedentary. It's time, say experts, to get kids moving again.
